page.title: 11HOBBIES AND PASTIMES...
page.content: The hobbies and pastimes of an 11 year old girl in 1985. I think the thing I enjoy most is playing "Rounders" with my friends. I like collecting different rubbers and soaps.I enjoy reading, and read quite alot at night, but do not read much during the daytime. I quite like playing the piano, I play at home and a teacher comes to my house to teach me each Tuesday for half an hour. I enjoy going on bike rides and having picnics with my friends. I look after our family pets, we have 2 guinea pigs, a dog and a cat.I love animals. I enjoy watching some television, I don't watch very much but every week on a Wednesday I make sure I watch "Dallas." Also I like listening to pop music on the radio.
